page.title: 08CARNFORTH EMPLOYMENT PATTERN
page.content: 150 families of Christ Church School were questioned about their jobs. 63 replies were received. From these replies we learned that 58 fathers, 42 mothers and 5 teenagers were in work. We divided the jobs into six categories. Total % of jobs. Tradespeople 22% Professionals 23% Office Workers 11% Shop Workers 18% Transport Workers 13% Others 13% A total of 22% worked in Carnforth. The majority of men who worked elsewhere worked at Heysham Nuclear Power Station.It was finished in 1982 and with over 500 workers is the main source of jobs in this area. Closure of Carnforth Ironworks and Railway Sheds lost many local jobs.
